text: Yo no creo en los hombres (English: I don't believe in men) is a Mexican telenovela produced by Giselle González for Televisa. It is based on Yo no creo en los hombres (1991), produced in México. Alejandro Camacho, Adriana Louvier and Gabriel Soto star in the series. Flavio Medina, Azela Robinson and Rosa María Bianchi also star. == Cast == Actor(s) Character Alejandro Camacho Claudio Bustamante Adriana Louvier María Dolores Morales Garza Gabriel Soto Maximiliano Bustamante Mondragon Azela Robinson Josefa Cabrera Flavio Medina Daniel Santibáñez de la Vega Luz María Jerez Alma Mondragón de Bustamante Rosa María Bianchi Úrsula de la Vega Macaria Esperanza Garza Vda. de Morales Cecilia Toussaint Honoria Ramirez de Delgado Juan Carlos Colombo Fermín Delgado Adalberto Parra Jacinto Sonia Franco Ivana Duval Pedro de Tavira Julián Delgado Ramirez Fabiola Guajardo Isela Ramos Cabrera Jorge Gallegos Orlando Estefania Villarreal Doris Balbuena Lenny de la Rosa Ari Pablo Perroni Gerry Elizabeth Guindi Susana Eleane Puell Clara Morales Garza Jesús Carús Leonardo Bustamante Mondragón Adriana Llabrés Jenny Tizoc Arroyo Adrian Sophie Alexander Maleny Santibáñez de la Vega Juan Carlos Barreto Arango Fernando Larrañaga Dr. Medina José de Jesús Aguilar Padre Juan José María Negri Isidro Aurora Clavel Chelito "Nanis" Violeta Isfel Nayeli Campos Emma Escalante Corina Rosas Jana Raluy Marcia José Ángel Garcia Rodolfo Morales Jesús Ochoa Marcelo Monterrubio == References == == Other websites == * Category:Telenovelas by Televisa Category:2014 Mexican television series debuts Category:2015 Mexican television series endings
